results.title: Comparison of vasopeptidase inhibitor, omapatrilat, and lisinopril on exercise tolerance and morbidity in patients with heart failure: IMPRESS randomised trial.
results.text_hl: The two drugs were fairly well tolerated, but there were fewer cardiovascular-system serious @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@adverse events@@@ in the @CHEMICAL_omapatrilat @CHEMICAL_MESH:C106266 @@@omapatrilat@@@ group than in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ group (20 [7%] vs 34 [12%], p=0.04).

results.title: Usefulness of patch tests for diagnosing selective allergy to captopril.
results.text_hl: Oral double-blind challenge tests with @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glibenclamide@@@, @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, and placebo showed good tolerance.

results.title: Chronic ethanol ingestion increases expression of the angiotensin II type 2 (AT2) receptor and enhances tumor necrosis factor-alpha- and angiotensin II-induced cytotoxicity via AT2 signaling in rat alveolar epithelial cells.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNF-alpha@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@cytotoxicity@@@, but not @GENE_AGT @GENE_24179 @@@angiotensin II@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@cytotoxicity@@@, was prevented by @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, indicating that de novo @GENE_AGT @GENE_24179 @@@angiotensin II@@@ synthesis is required for @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNF-alpha@@@-induced apoptosis in these cells.

citations.NLM: Bechara RI, Brown LA, Eaton DC, Roman J, Guidot DM. Chronic ethanol ingestion increases expression of the angiotensin II type 2 (AT2) receptor and enhances tumor necrosis factor-alpha- and angiotensin II-induced cytotoxicity via AT2 signaling in rat alveolar epithelial cells. Alcohol Clin Exp Res. 2003 Jun;27(6):1006-14. PMID: 12824823
